## Checklist

### Required

- [ ] SKILL.md has valid frontmatter (name, description)
- [ ] Security scan passes (`/scan-secrets`)
- [ ] No hardcoded personal paths or secrets
- [ ] Tested locally with Claude Code

### For New Skills

- [ ] Includes README.md
- [ ] Directory name matches skill name
- [ ] Added to plugin.json and marketplace.json
- [ ] Added to README.md skill table

### For Scripts

- [ ] Scripts are executable
- [ ] requirements.txt included (if Python dependencies)
- [ ] Works with Python 3.9+
